text:
Hi everyone,

As part of the partnership with HubSpot we have a test account loaded with all the features, but when I create a sandbox for this account, some features like the Sales > Forecast are locked because we don't have a sales pro subscription (which we do, in production we're sales enterprise).

Is this a bug or is everyone in the same situation ?
I was looking at one of those <@UATE4ATHP>, Iâ€™ll def have to get one now

integrating with a signature platform is a clean way to do so.
Maybe right now an embed would be prudent - what have you tried?
Does HubSpot support Japanese as a CMS/translate language?
The dev docs are built on CMS Hub, and we are using the multi language feature ourselves.
